title: [82. Remove Duplicates from Sorted List II](https://leetcode.cn/problems/remove-duplicates-from-sorted-list-ii/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
82. Remove Duplicates from Sorted List II Description Given the head of a sorted linked list, delete all nodes that have duplicate numbers, leaving only distinct numbers from the original list. Return the linked list sorted as well.
 
Example 1:
Input: head = [1,2,3,3,4,4,5] Output: [1,2,5] Example 2:
Input: head = [1,1,1,2,3] Output: [2,3]  
Constraints:
The number of nodes in the list is in the range [0, 300]. -100 <= Node.val <= 100 The list is guaranteed to be sorted in ascending order. Related Topics Linked List Two Pointers Similar Questions Remove Duplicates from Sorted List Remove Duplicates From an Unsorted Linked List
